name: Bas Les Pattes !
description:
Bas Les Pattes is a game almost entirely made during the Ludum Dare 50. You play as a hand holding a fly swatter and you defend your loot against other thieve hands.

Slap till they take everything from you !

Main graphical inspirations are kids / heave ho.

There is no sound implemented in the game on release but I might add some later.
